subject: Order SSN2004
description_text:
Hi there,

I just placed an order for the base plate and carbon fibre heel plate, I
have the pro X ultra pedals and I ordered the plate to secure them to the
rig, can you please confirm that the plate includes plate for pedals and
heel plate? I couldn't find much information on the website.

Thank you,

Christian

conversations.body_text: Hi Christian Colognesi,     Yes, this includes the base plate and the Heel plate.
